articles.title: Jamie Carragher "thought he was getting sacked" after 'weirdest' Erling Haaland interview - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Norwegian forward netted a brace as Borussia Dortmund beat Club Brugge 3-0 in the Champions League - but it was his performance off the pitch that caught Carragher's eye
articles.content:
Despite only being 20, Erling Haaland has already developed a reputation for somewhat awkward post-match press conferences.
Often not his fault, the Borussia Dortmund forward has faced criticism for… [+2284 chars]
